Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.scene

Class MapSceneManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.ViewObservable
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.scene.MapSceneManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
SceneManagerInterface
public class MapSceneManager extends ViewObservable implements SceneManagerInterface
This class represent the map on the view package.
